Name: Squillamorph
About the game: Squillamorph is a challenging action game with a 2D pixel art style. Pursued by brutal enemies, you must use your parasitic Infest ability to take control of them. Infest, fight, and survive through a strange mechanical world. Possess the Enemies Enemies will do everything they can to destroy you. Brought to life using a mix of procedural and traditional animation, fights against them are varied and dynamic. Use your Infest ability to possess them and fight back. Infesting an enemy will give you total control of it. Whatever it can do, you can do. Progress through the hostile world and face all manner of creatures, which you can use in your battle for survival. Face Monstrous Bosses Creatures in the world are unrelenting in their pursuit of you. Make it far enough and you will be faced with the most dangerous of enemies. Defeating them will not be easy but will reward you with powerful upgrades. Can you defeat them? Explore a Mysterious World You have been thrown into a strange world and are presented with many questions. Why were you created? Why does everything want to destroy you? What are you? If you can survive through the tough world you are thrown into, you might find the answers. ------- Squillamorph is being developed by James Barrow. “Building worlds and telling stories is my passion. Be it through games, art, or music. Squillamorph is a game I am extremely excited to work on and share with the world!” A quick note: This game is difficult. Progressing through it will be tough. Can you make it to the end?
